text: Anata no omo ga, tenshi-tachi ni keiji sa reta toki o omoi nasai. `Ware wa anata gata to issho ni iru noda. Shink≈ç suru mono-tachi o kengo ni seyo.' Ware wa fushin-sha-tachi no kokoronouchi ni, osore o shimikoma seyou. Sonotoki anata gata wa kare-ra no kubi o hane, mata sorezore no yubisaki o uchikire
